meanings.definition: Surrounding or encircling with a belt or girdle.
meanings.sent1: The begirdling belt held up his pants securely.
meanings.sent2: She admired the begirdling ribbon around the gift box.
meanings.sent3: The begirdling scarf matched perfectly with her outfit.
meanings.sent4: The begirdling vines intertwined to form a natural belt.
meanings.sent5: The begirdling fence marked the boundary of the garden.

meanings.definition: Encompassing or encircling with a barrier or boundary.
meanings.sent1: The begirdling wall protected the castle from invaders.
meanings.sent2: The begirdling fog obscured the view of the valley.
meanings.sent3: The begirdling rule prevented any shortcuts in the game.
meanings.sent4: The begirdling mountain range shielded the village from harsh winds.
meanings.sent5: The begirdling forest enclosed the hidden waterfall.
